abstract: Russians sports agent Andrey Baranov denies engaging in any criminal activity, as federal law enforcement officials are looking into whether he conspired with organizers of New York City Marathon to allow athletes using banned substances to compete; investigation is part of broader inquiry that has found Russian athletes and officials guilty of doping or aiding in doping.
lead_paragraph: Authorities are looking into whether Andrey Baranov conspired with American marathon organizers to allow athletes using banned substances to compete in their events.
snippet: Authorities are looking into whether Andrey Baranov conspired with American marathon organizers to allow athletes using banned substances to compete in their events....

headline.main: Russian Sports Agent and U.S. Marathon Officials Under Federal Investigation
headline.print_headline: Russian Doping Inquiry Reaches U.S. Shores
